ATTR_UNIT_MEASURE: 0 = No data		; 1 Sporadic violations of rights = 1; 2 Repeated violations of rights =2; 3 Regular violations of rights =3; 4 Systematic violations of rights =4; 5 and 5+ No guarantee of rights / 5+ No guarantee of rights due to the breakdown of the rule of law = 5
ATTR_NOTE_OF_SOURCE: Data source: ITUC Global Rights Index (annual update, available online in tabular form)  https://www.globalrightsindex.org/en/2022/countries
ATTR_INDICATOR_NOTE_OF_SOURCE: This indicator is drawn from the ITUC annual global rights index which documents violations of internationally recognised collective labour rights by governments and employers. The methodology is grounded in standards of fundamental rights at work, in particular the right to freedom of association, the right to collective bargaining and the right to strike.
